info.title: Keycloak Admin REST API
info.description: This is a REST API reference for the Keycloak Admin REST API.

get.summary: Get accessible realms Returns a list of accessible realms. The list is filtered based on what realms the caller is allowed to view.

post.summary: Import a realm. Imports a realm from a full representation of that realm.

get.summary: Get the top-level representation of the realm It will not include nested information like User and Client representations.

put.summary: Update the top-level information of the realm Any user, roles or client information in the representation will be ignored.

delete.summary: Delete the realm

get.summary: Get admin events Returns all admin events, or filters events based on URL query parameters listed here

delete.summary: Delete all admin events
Clear any user login failures for all users This can release temporary disabled users

get.summary: Get status of a username in brute force detection

delete.summary: Clear any user login failures for the user This can release temporary disabled user

get.summary: Get authenticator providers Returns a stream of authenticator providers.
Get client authenticator providers Returns a stream of client authenticator providers.

post.summary: Create a new authentication flow
Copy existing authentication flow under a new name The new name is given as 'newName' attribute of the passed JSON object

delete.summary: Delete required action

Raise required action’s priority

get.summary: Get unregistered required actions Returns a stream of unregistered required actions.
